supplier_of: agricultural production | biotechnologies for agriculture | water absorption plants | accessories for watering systems | moisture absorption
information: Our company, located in Tulln, is dedicated to producing AgroBiogel, a novel bio-based water superabsorbent and agrochemical storage and slow-release system for agricultural applications which is 100% organic. AgroBiogel increases soil water holding capacity, organic matter/humus and fertility and helps plants from increasing droughts and irregular rainfall. They help farmers, plant growers, and home gardeners in their own homes or gardens to conserve water by reducing the frequency of watering. The hydrogels are said to help some of the more than 60% of the world's grain farmers who rely solely on rain-fed agriculture.
keywords: Agricultural Production, water absorption plants, moisture absorption, accessories for watering systems, biotechnologies for agriculture
